name: gulp-embed-lqip-as-background
description: Gulp plugin which generates HTML image placeholders using lqip technique and allows to embed them into the image background to get rid of client-side javascript.
author: lilliputten <lilliputten@gmail.com> (https://lilliputten.com/)

scripts.eslint-debug: echo --Lint sources with eslint in debug mode-- && cross-env DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine eslint .
scripts.eslint-fix: echo --Lint and auto-fix sources with eslint-- && eslint --fix .
scripts.lint: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all eslint type-check && echo --All check-ups passed--
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all prettier lint && echo --All check-ups passed--
scripts.clear-cache: echo --Clear caches-- && rimraf node_modules/.cache && echo Cleared webpack cache
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
